parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many items to return at one time (max 100)

x-next.description: A link to the next page of responses

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets?limit=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    "authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

headers = { 'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN" }

conn.request("GET", "/v1/pets?limit=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets?limit=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

curl --request GET \
  --url 'http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets?limit=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'

requestBody.description: Pet to add to the store

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\",\"tag\":\"string\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    "authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import requests

url = "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets"

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\",\"tag\":\"string\"}"
headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

response = requests.request("POST", url, data=payload, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\",\"tag\":\"string\"}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/v1/pets", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\",\"tag\":\"string\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

curl --request POST \
  --url http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"id":0,"name":"string","tag":"string"}'

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: The id of the pet to retrieve

));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {

}

import requests

headers = {'authorization': 'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

headers = { 'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN" }

conn.request("GET", "/v1/pets/%7BpetId%7D", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets/%7BpetId%7D"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

curl --request GET \
  --url http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets/%7BpetId%7D \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: The id of the pet to delete

200.description: Expected response to a valid request

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets/%7BpetId%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "DELETE",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    "authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN",
    "key: SOME_STRING_VALUE"
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import requests

url = "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets/%7BpetId%7D"

headers = {
    'key': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

response = requests.request("DELETE", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

headers = {
    'key': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

conn.request("DELETE", "/v1/pets/%7BpetId%7D", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets/%7BpetId%7D"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("key", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

curl --request DELETE \
  --url http://petstore.swagger.io/v1/pets/%7BpetId%7D \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'key: SOME_STRING_VALUE'

petstore_auth.description: This API uses OAuth 2 with the client credential grant flow.
